It needs to attach a GPS to it. Like I'll find my drone.

topics.description: Explain how home direction and distance are affected when arming quad.
topics.coverage_text:
Found it!
That was far as fun.
That was far, right?
That's why I was like, I can't hear it. Where is it?
I heard it that way.
It started going RX lost, which means that I'm about to fall out of the sky.

topics.title: GPS Rescue Mode CLI Tab
topics.description: Explains the CLI tab for GPS rescue mode and its settings.
topics.coverage_text:
Hey guys, this is SupaFPV here, and today's video is all about this little gadget right here.
This little lifesaver.
And it is a GPS.
Essentially, it will do two things.
Show you where your drone is in relation to your start point.
And it can also have the function to bring back to your original location by flipping a switch on your controller.
So if you're interested, stick around.
And just before we start the video, consider subscribing if you want more content like this.
And if you guys have any other video ideas, please do comment down below and I'll try to work hard to make one of those ideas.
Or a few of those ideas or all of them.
So this is the BN220 dual GPS GLONASS module by Bishin.
And who is this meant for?

topics.title: Initializing GPS Fix
topics.description: Explain how to initialize GPS fix and what to expect during this process.
topics.coverage_text:
This is meant for those people who are flying relatively mid to long range.
Long range for sure.
You definitely want one of these things or something more expensive like a nicer one like the BN880.
But for those of us like me who fly a relatively mid to half long range ish, definitely in areas like you saw in my video in the clip in the beginning where I was flying above the treetops and on top of a lake.
And everything kind of looked the same.
Even the landing areas look the same.
And all the trees look the same.
And the ridge line looked the same.
And I was just like, where am I?

topics.title: OSD Overview
topics.description: Shows the OSD (On-Screen Display) and its features, including home direction and distance, speed, longitude, and latitude.
topics.coverage_text:
What the crap is going on?
A little history on that video.
I was flying at the lake in Austin and I flew kind of far over the lake.
And then I was trying to come back and none of us in my group of seven could hear the drone to ascertain where on earth it was.
Was it to the right of us?
Was it to the left of us?

topics.title: GPS Rescue Mode Usage
topics.description: Explains how to use GPS rescue mode and what happens when you fly a certain distance away from your location.
topics.coverage_text:
We had no clue.
I eventually just landed in the middle of a field and split into two parties and we just went out and searched for it.
And again, as my friend said, you should you should put a GPS on it, like find my phone kind of thing.
And that's exactly what this does.
So if you're interested, again, stick around and I'll show you how to put together this onto your drone and set it all up.

topics.title: Conclusion
topics.description: Summary of the video and call to action for viewers.
topics.coverage_text:
And again, this is meant for those people who fly relatively mid to long range.
And it's really nice to have definitely not a need to have if you're flying mid range, but definitely must have if you're flying long range.
